name: Alien Defense Force
description:
(Just noticed that I had the wrong scene built. Should be fixed now.)

Armed with a mighty robot mech suit, your mission is to destroy as many of the invading alien ships as you can and protect the city.  Use whatever power-ups you can find and take out the alien menace!

So, this is one of my first games that I've solely designed, and the first that I've uploaded to the public. All of the art assets and code were made by me. It's not perfect, but I'm very proud of this. Any constructive criticism is welcome. Enjoy!

Created in Unity 2018.2.5f1
